name: workspaces/inworld-playground/common-knowledge/37198dac-f39f-4279-8704-6d194a6123bc
description: The Goals Room is one of the more advanced rooms in the Inworld Playground. It is used to demonstrate API based interaction and responses we support for your characters. This room will demonstrate intent recognition, verbatim character responses, sending triggers with dynamic parameters, dynamic data retrieval, mid conversation character mutations and the ability to dynamically enable and disable goals.
